entity.description: Release planning, versioning, deployment, and maintenance procedures for DOTS Family Mode including Nix packaging, systemd integration, and production deployment strategies

requirements.description: Use semantic versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH), maintain version consistency across workspace crates, tag releases with git tags, update CHANGELOG.md with release notes, and coordinate version bumps across all crates
requirements.title: Version Management

requirements.description: Maintain flake.nix with proper derivation definitions, test nix build on multiple platforms, package all binaries and assets, include systemd service files in package, provide installation instructions for NixOS and non-NixOS systems
requirements.title: Nix Packaging & Distribution

requirements.description: Provide systemd service installation procedures, configure proper service dependencies and startup order, implement database migration strategies for upgrades, provide backup and restore procedures, and document configuration management
requirements.title: Production Deployment

requirements.description: All tests must pass in CI before release, security audit must be performed, performance regression testing completed, compatibility testing across supported Linux distributions, and release notes reviewed by stakeholders
requirements.title: Quality Assurance for Releases

requirements.description: All releases must be validated in clean NixOS VM environments, test installation from nix packages, validate systemd service behavior in production-like environment, test upgrade procedures from previous versions, and verify multi-user family scenarios work correctly
requirements.title: NixOS VM Validation for Releases

entity.title: Release Management Framework
